mapper.select: SELECT ID, sei, mei, mei_KANA, sei_KANA, ZIP1, ZIP2, ADDRESS_PREFECTURE, ADDRESS_CITY, ADDRESS_OOAZA, ADDRESS_AZA, ADDRESS_OTHER, TEL1, TEL2, TEL3, MOBILE_TEL1, MOBILE_TEL2, MOBILE_TEL3, EMAIL, PASSWORD, SETAI_FAMILY, SETAI_COUNT, SETAI_STATUS, SETAI_YEAR, SETAI_LOAN, INCOME, SAVINGS, EMPLOYMENT_STATUS, COMPANY_NAME, COMPANY_ZIP1, COMPANY_ZIP2, COMPANY_ADDRESS_PREFECTURE, COMPANY_ADDRESS_CITY, COMPANY_ADDRESS_OOAZA, COMPANY_ADDRESS_AZA, COMPANY_ADDRESS_OTHER, COMPANY_TEL1, COMPANY_TEL2, COMPANY_TEL3, COMPANY_DEPARTMENT, COMPANY_INDUSTRY_TYPE, COMPANY_WORK_YEARS, UPDATE_DATE FROM M_CUSTOMER WHERE ID = #{id} AND DELETE_FLG = '0'
mapper.update:
UPDATE M_CUSTOMER SET
sei = #{sei},
mei = #{mei},
mei_KANA = #{meiKana},
sei_KANA = #{seiKana},
ZIP1 = #{zip1},
ZIP2 = #{zip2},
ADDRESS_PREFECTURE = #{addressPrefecture},
ADDRESS_CITY = #{addressCity},
ADDRESS_OOAZA = #{addressOoaza},
ADDRESS_AZA = #{addressAza},
ADDRESS_OTHER = #{addressOther},
TEL1 = #{tel1},
TEL2 = #{tel2},
TEL3 = #{tel3},
MOBILE_TEL1 = #{mobileTel1},
MOBILE_TEL2 = #{mobileTel2},
MOBILE_TEL3 = #{mobileTel3},
EMAIL = #{email},
SETAI_FAMILY = #{setaiFamily},
SETAI_COUNT = #{setaiCount},
SETAI_STATUS = #{setaiStatus},
SETAI_YEAR = #{setaiYear},
SETAI_LOAN = #{setaiLoan},
INCOME = #{income},
SAVINGS = #{savings},
EMPLOYMENT_STATUS = #{employmentStatus},
COMPANY_NAME = #{companyName},
COMPANY_ZIP1 = #{companyZip1},
COMPANY_ZIP2 = #{companyZip2},
COMPANY_ADDRESS_PREFECTURE = #{companyAddressPrefecture},
COMPANY_ADDRESS_CITY = #{companyAddressCity},
COMPANY_ADDRESS_OOAZA = #{companyAddressOoaza},
COMPANY_ADDRESS_AZA = #{companyAddressAza},
COMPANY_ADDRESS_OTHER = #{companyAddressOther},
COMPANY_TEL1 = #{companyTel1},
COMPANY_TEL2 = #{companyTel2},
COMPANY_TEL3 = #{companyTel3},
COMPANY_DEPARTMENT = #{companyDepartment},
COMPANY_INDUSTRY_TYPE = #{companyIndustryType},
COMPANY_WORK_YEARS = #{companyWorkYears},
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO M_CUSTOMER( ID, sei, mei, mei_KANA, sei_KANA, ZIP1, ZIP2, ADDRESS_PREFECTURE, ADDRESS_CITY, ADDRESS_OOAZA,
ADDRESS_AZA,
ADDRESS_OTHER,
TEL1, TEL2, TEL3,
MOBILE_TEL1,
MOBILE_TEL2,
MOBILE_TEL3,
EMAIL, SETAI_FAMILY, SETAI_COUNT, SETAI_STATUS, SETAI_YEAR, SETAI_LOAN, INCOME, SAVINGS, EMPLOYMENT_STATUS, COMPANY_NAME, COMPANY_ZIP1, COMPANY_ZIP2, COMPANY_ADDRESS_PREFECTURE, COMPANY_ADDRESS_CITY, COMPANY_ADDRESS_OOAZA,
COMPANY_ADDRESS_AZA,
COMPANY_ADDRESS_OTHER,
COMPANY_TEL1, COMPANY_TEL2, COMPANY_TEL3, COMPANY_DEPARTMENT, COMPANY_INDUSTRY_TYPE, COMPANY_WORK_YEARS, PASSWORD, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER ) VALUES( #{id}, #{sei}, #{mei}, #{meiKana}, #{seiKana}, #{zip1}, #{zip2}, #{addressPrefecture}, #{addressCity}, #{addressOoaza},
#{addressAza},
#{addressOther},
#{tel1}, #{tel2}, #{tel3},
#{mobileTel1},
#{mobileTel2},
#{mobileTel3},
#{email}, #{setaiFamily}, #{setaiCount}, #{setaiStatus}, #{setaiYear}, #{setaiLoan}, #{income}, #{savings}, #{employmentStatus}, #{companyName}, #{companyZip1}, #{companyZip2}, #{companyAddressPrefecture}, #{companyAddressCity}, #{companyAddressOoaza},
#{companyAddressAza},
#{companyAddressOther},
#{companyTel1}, #{companyTel2}, #{companyTel3}, #{companyDepartment}, #{companyIndustryType}, #{companyWorkYears}, #{password}, #{createDate}, #{createUser}, #{updateDate}, #{updateUser} )
